did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Legal documents, correspondence, receipts, account books, maps.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Collection includes land and legal documents, correspondence, receipts, account books, and maps.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Land agent for Pulteney Land Office.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Collection includes land and legal documents, correspondence, receipts, account books, and maps.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Joseph Fellows papers, #4154. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

unittitle.extref: Link to a finding aid with a lengthy description of the collection.

did.unittitle: Ledger Book of Joseph Fellows (mostly personal accounts)
Account of J. Fellows with Bank of Monroe
Small book of handwritten poetry (in envelope)
Account of J. Fellows with Bank of Geneva
Account of J. Fellows with N.B. Kidder, Banker
Account of J. Fellows Co. with The Rochester City Bank
Account of J. Fellows with Steuben County Bank
Check book (only stubs) of John Heermans
J. (or S.) H. Brown's report of lands in the Buffalo and Tonawanda reservations
Accounts of Ontario Glass Mfg. Co. with various people
J. Fellows in Account with J.N. Hungerford's Bank (blank)
J. Fellows - sm. bk. of accounts
J. Fellows - scct. with Bank of the Interior (Albany)
Account of J. Fellows with N.B. Kidder
Account of Ward and Co. with J. Fellows, Esq.
Sm. book with notes pertaining to Indian Reservations
Q.W. Wellington and Co.'s Bank in account with H.C. Heermans
Account, of John Ward and Co. with J. Fellows
J. Fellows - Oaths, 1812; Will, accounts, 1813; Ledgers, 1843-1844
Postage accounts; "Memorandums;" various other accounts and notes
Form book of contracts, with ms. letter drafts
Appraisals of improvements on reservations (by Thomas Sove and Ira Cook)
Form book of contracts (v. much used) and other legal papers
Copies of letters, receipts, etc., written on back for Sodus Canal Co. Stock Receipts
Supreme Court cases about land transactions
Account for auction and balance sheet for Indian reservation
Accounts with Manhattan Co., Geneva Bank, Mohawk Bank, etc.
Lists of rents, receipts for land
Buisness accounts and some household accounts
Accounts of C. Williamson, Indian reservations, D. Caeron, etc.
Journal and Ledger relating to Indian reservations
Land purchased for taxes record book
Western lands belonging to J. Fellows (Book 5)
Mutli-use book (cash book, scrapbook re railroads, plank road laws) (Book 29)
N. and C. Low day book (in account with McCay) (Book 34)
Sales of Johnstone and Pulteney Estates
Inventory, Geneva Church and promissory notes
Multi-Use book; land contracts, daybook, scrapbook (Book 31)
Other New York State area maps

scopecontent.p: Includes map of Onondaga purchase of 1817

did.unittitle: New York State area maps and chart
6 maps of Buffalo Creek Indian reservation
Holland Land Co. or Buffalo Creek Reservation
